channel.title: Comments on: October Retroblog
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description:
I'm going to go ahead and lay claim to that term.
Retroblog: To blog in memoir form, altering the time stamp of posts to coincide with the relative date of the memory.
item.content:encoded:
I’m going to go ahead and lay claim to that term.

Retroblog: To blog in memoir form, altering the time stamp of posts to coincide with the relative date of the memory.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: Incidentally, you were result #4 when I googled "retroblog". Perhaps you will start a meme.
item.content:encoded: Incidentally, you were result #4 when I googled “retroblog”. Perhaps you will start a meme.
